data.title: Passions Trivia Season #7
data.text:
Welcome to the town of Harmony, a quaint but not too quiet town of New England! Where magic and the supernatural work together to create, passion, humour, romance, and disater for the beloved residents of this little town.

Harmony has ever seen, who just so happen to rule the entire town! The Bennetts, the Lopez-Fitzgeralds, and the Russells. And of course Harmony's 300 year old witch Tabitha and her daughter Endora!

Created by:

Are you ready for...

Our "When Will I Die" Quiz?

Who almost strangled Katherine Crane while sleepwalking?

Pilar

Sheridan

Rebecca

Rachel

Who was charged with poisoning Liz, and was charged with three counts of attempted murder?

Rebecca

Ivy

Beth

Eve

Who kidnapped baby Jane?

Rebecca

Ivy

Gwen

Beth

Who is Beth's father?!

Julian

Alistair

Johnathan Hotchkiss

Martin

Los Angeles

Paris

Las Vegas

Miami

Lopez-Fitzgerald

Cranes

Bennetts

Hotchkiss

Theresa

Sheridan

Luis

Fox

Who causes the massive earthquake in Harmony?

naturally occurs

the boys in the basement

the evil from hell

Christopher

Matthew

Mark

David

How did Jessica's first john die?

he was shot

he drowned

he was stabbed

he was overdosed

another earthquake

a hurricane

a tornado

a tsunami

What saves Katherine's life during the earthquake?

a piece of wood

Julian

Alistair

her sister's coffin

"Hasta La Vista"

"Bon Voyage"

"Now Leaving Harmony"

"Help Me!!"

Julian

Alistair

Spike

one of Al's goons

What does Simone reveal to her mother?

she's pregnant

she's married

she's a lesbian

she was accepted to a prestigious university

Paloma Lopez-Fitzgerald; at the Harmony Inn

Kay Bennett; on top of the community center

Jessica Bennett; at the motel where she was hooking

Simone; at the Crane mansion

Who decided to become a nun?

Theresa

Whitney

Jessica

What is Chris' son "Mark"'s real name?

John

James

Jeremy

What reason did Chris give Sheridan for his odd behaviour?

he was in the mob

he was part of the FBI

he was a spy from a foreign country

he was in the witness protection program

Who married Alistair Crane?

Rebecca

Ivy

Theresa

Pilar

Rebecca

Theresa

Gwen

Pilar

Alistair

Spike

Roberto & Paloma

Paloma

What big announcement did Alistair make to his entire family?

he was giving up Crane Industries

he disinherited the whole family; and gave everything to Little Ethan

he's moving to Dubai and taking Rebecca with him

he killed Rachel

Who poisoned the guacamole?

Theresa

Gwen

Rebecca

Liz

Katherine

Maria; Pilar's sister

Rachel; Katherine's sister

Beth

Theresa & Ethan

Sheridan & Chris

Gwen & Ethan

Fox & Kay

Who kidnapped a comatose Ethan?

Gwen & Rebecca

Rebecca & Ivy

Theresa & Noah

Gwen & Theresa

Who escapes from the mental asylum?

Beth

Edna

Edna & Norma

Norma

What does Theresa say she'll do in a prayer to God at the Christmas Midnight Mass?

she'll fight for Ethan

she'll turn Crane Industries into something positive

she'll give up Ethan

she agrees to shared custody of Jane

What happened to Edna & Norma?

the boys in the basement make them disappear

Tabitha casts a spell on them

Endora zaps them into a Christmas Ornament

the "good" side help Endora & Tabitha

Remember to rate this quiz on the next page!

Rating helps us to know which quizzes are good and which are bad.

What is GotoQuiz? A better kind of quiz site: no pop-ups, no registration requirements, just high-quality quizzes that you can create and share on your social network. Have a look around and see what we're about.
